the Justia Insights Client Newsletter!

Featured News

Should Your Law Firm Invest in Google Local Services Ads (LSAs) and Google Ads?

Law firms want to know how to best spend their money when it comes to advertising. Which marketing strategy will result in the highest return on investment (ROI), and how can you get started? Or, if you’re already running advertisements, such as Google Ads, you may wonder if your campaigns are fully optimized to get the best results possible. We want to give you an honest take on Google’s latest offering for law firms, Local Services Ads (LSAs), as well as Google Ads.

From the Desk of Justia

Why You Should Consider a Podcast for Your Law Firm

Part of creating a successful digital marketing strategy for your firm is incorporating new ways of connecting with your clients and other lawyers. Learn more about the reasons you should consider adding a podcast to your marketing approach.

Marketing 101: Engaging With Former Clients

Remaining engaged with (or re-engaging with) your former clients is an often overlooked marketing strategy for many attorneys. Check out this post to learn more about why marketing to these former clients is important for your firm and how to do it.

Lawyers in Film: 20 Great Movies About the Law

Since the invention of cinema, many different stories have been shared on the silver screen. The law is no exception. Through the decades, movie lovers have enjoyed tales of thrill, crime, courtrooms, and more that have become some of the greatest classics.

Justia Dockets: Legal Trends, Active Jurisdictions, and Common Lawsuit Types

Ever wondered what the most commonly filed civil suits are in your state? Want to know how the COVID-19 pandemic impacted activity in the federal court system? We have answers.

Justia Q&A: 5 Common Questions About Search and SEO

Have you ever wondered whether you should allow a guest to post on your blog? Do you worry whether your Title Tags are too long for SEO value? Should you do press releases as a means to generate links? This post has 5 answers to some common questions we receive from lawyers like you.

5 Digital Marketing Tips for Family Lawyers

While you always want to employ general marketing best practices for your law firm, it is important to also implement focused strategies that work for your key practice areas. If you are a family lawyer looking for a few effective digital marketing strategies for your practice area, then this is the post you have been waiting for.

6 Tips for Creating Your Law Firm's Marketing Plan

A key part of achieving marketing success is creating a marketing plan to guide your strategy. Check out this post for 6 tips to remember when creating a marketing plan for your law firm.

Tip of the Month

Add a Branding Campaign with Google Ads

We highly recommend utilizing Google Ads to start a branding campaign. With branding campaigns, you control your message and namespace and increase your visibility on the search engine results page. These campaigns typically only cost a few hundred dollars each month (depending on your firm name) and certainly benefit your firm, especially when coupled with a regular Google Ads campaign.

With our limited-time offer of $500 in Google Ads Credit when you sign up for Justia Amplify PPC Management, now is the perfect time to get started! It really is that easy to take your marketing to the next level.
